verbose_text: These PBC associated autoantibodies elicit peculiar ANA patterns, such as the cytoplasmic reticule like speckled pattern (associated with AMA) [XREF_BIBR], the multiple nuclear dots pattern (associated to anti-Sp100 antibodies), the rim like membranous pattern (linked to positivity to anti-gp210 antibodies), and the centromeric pattern [XREF_BIBR].
